participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and caring, often worried about loved ones but expresses himself through art.
participant_1.background: I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble. I can draw. I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work. I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and friendly, enjoys connecting with others, but has a wary side due to trust issues.
participant_2.background: I hope my friends and family are doing well. I love to listen to religious music. Ferrari is my favorite car company. I'm not sure my height is relevant to the question. I do not trust anyone.

content.text: Good thanks for asking, how are you?
I'm doing well just a bit stressed out about my brother
Sorry to hear that. Is he in trouble again?
Yeah he is, he's always getting himself into trouble.
That must be really tough, I'm sorry you have to deal with that.
What do you do for work?
That's really cool! What kind of art do you do?
Oh that's awesome! I love to draw too.
What kind of stuff do you draw?
I like to draw people, animals, and landscapes.
Wow that's really cool! I mostly draw portraits and landscapes.
Oh nice! We should trade some drawings sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to see your work.
Great! I'll message you my email address
